entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Webequie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:55 p.m. EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:58 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow with periods of ice pellets early in the morning and with periods of freezing drizzle late in the morning and in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:58 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow mixed with freezing drizzle. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle or ice pellets early in the evening. Snow mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain beginning in the evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:58 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023
